132.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

117.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

122.movie_plot: Cyborg law enforcer RoboCop returns to protect the citizens of old Detroit but faces a deadly challenge when a rogue OCP member secretly creates a new, evil RoboCop 2.

123.movie_name: Battle for the Planet of the Apes (1973)

125.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

102.movie_plot: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

129.movie_plot: Aircraft factory worker Barry Kane goes on the run across the United States when he is wrongly accused of starting a fire that killed his best friend.

124.movie_name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes (1972)

133.movie_plot: Both the CIA and KGB investigate UFOs in Alaska: friend or foe?

110.movie_plot: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

103.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

109.movie_plot: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

120.movie_plot: The almost-human son of "Brundlefly" searches for a cure to his mutated genes while being monitored by a nefarious corporation that wishes to continue his father's experiments.

107.movie_plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

104.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

114.movie_plot: United States military leaders plot to overthrow the President because he supports a nuclear disarmament treaty and they fear a Soviet sneak attack.

115.movie_plot: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

106.movie_name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier (1989)

105.movie_plot: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

126.movie_plot: A high school student and his friend find a strange, orb-like piece of equipment to use as a science project, but must stop it when it begins to threaten mankind.

131.movie_plot: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

50.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)

63.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)

82.movie_plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

41.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

79.movie_plot: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

2.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

53.movie_plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

49.movie_plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

92.movie_plot: (SIRIUS 6B, Year 2078) On a distant mining planet ravaged by a decade of war, scientists have created the perfect weapon: a blade-wielding, self-replicating race of killing devices known as...

18.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

22.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

73.movie_plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

28.movie_plot: There is panic throughout the nation as the dead suddenly come back to life. The film follows a group of characters who barricade themselves in an old farmhouse in an attempt to remain safe from these bloodthirsty, flesh-eating monsters.

55.movie_plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

9.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)

72.movie_plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

56.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

6.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)

16.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

45.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
45.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

78.movie_plot: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

7.movie_name: Day the Earth Stood Still, The (1951)
7.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

85.movie_name: It Came from Beneath the Sea (1955)
85.movie_plot: A giant, radioactive octopus rises from the Philippine Trench to terrorize the North American Pacific Coast.

46.movie_plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

1.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

83.movie_plot: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

4.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

20.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

29.movie_plot: Catherine Sloper has found the man of her dreams in Morris Townsend, but her plans to marry him are strongly opposed by her father, who believes Townsend is only interested in his daughter ...

91.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

25.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

40.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

48.movie_plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

64.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
64.movie_plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

88.movie_plot: Army doctor Robert Neville struggles to create a cure for the plague that wiped out most of the human race.

68.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)

98.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

93.movie_plot: The USA must join forces with the USSR in order to destroy a gigantic asteroid heading straight for Earth.

5.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

80.movie_plot: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

51.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
51.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

13.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

8.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

95.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

42.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

60.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

24.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

59.movie_plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

94.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

58.movie_plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.

89.movie_plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

86.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

15.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)
15.movie_plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

17.movie_plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

57.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.
